author: rgrabowski
msg: Simple test demonstrating a background thread setting a ThreadContext property that is recorded correctly by an appender's  %property pattern.

author: danj
msg: Fix for MUSE-31 - modified NotificationProducer.publish() so that users can publish a notification
with 2-3 less lines of code and w/o learning the NotificationMessage API. The new method cuts right
to the chase and provides a way to send a payload associated with an optional topic.
I also (finally) introduced a ResourcePropertyChangeEvent class that is a simple bean for users that
need to make the WSRP change notifications manually (such as in cases where the changes are happening
outside the Muse application and are reported through some other product API). They can now do this
without having to write DOM manipulation code - just create an RPCE and pass it to publish(). The
ChangeNotificationListener was updated to use this class.

author: rineholt
msg: fix provided by raymond so sun's jars are found for plugins too.
